sentences.en: A browser is a super - flier to go to the E - supermarket.
sentences.cn: 浏览器就是去网上超市的超级快车了.

sentences.en: A high flier may have an impossible hope for the future.
sentences.cn: 好高骛远的人,也许将来有个难以实现的愿望.

sentences.en: A local Navy flier was reported missing in action.
sentences.cn: 据报道,当地海军的一架飞机在行动中失踪.

sentences.en: A woman contacted me after seeing the flier.
sentences.cn: 有个看了画像的妇女联系到了我.

sentences.en: Do you have to print on a flier for everything?
sentences.cn: 你非得把所有的事情都打印在传单上 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you have to print out a flier for everything?
sentences.cn: 你是不是做每件事的时候都要做一张传单?

sentences.en: Laura: So cool. Someone gave me this flier at the exit. what's it about?
sentences.cn: 罗拉：真酷。在出口处有人发给我这张传单。它上面说的什么啊？

sentences.en: Review your frequent - flier accounts often , and use the miles whenever possible.
sentences.cn: 检查你的常飞顾客酬宾(frequent-flier )账户, 尽可能使用打折机票.

sentences.en: Studies the hypervelocity launch feature of graded - impedance flier - plates .
sentences.cn: 研究波阻抗梯度飞片的超高速 发射特性.

sentences.en: The eagle is a high flier.
The flier flew a new - type jet plane.
sentences.cn: 飞行员驾驶一架新式喷气机.

sentences.en: The flier is flying a new - type jet plane on trial.
sentences.cn: 飞行员正在驾驶一架新式喷气机作试验飞行.

sentences.en: The flier says all the aerobics trainers there graduate from International Personal Trainer Institute.
sentences.cn: 这上面说所有的健美操教练都是国际私人教练学院毕业的.

sentences.en: The sleds a wonderful names painted on them too Rose board Megnolya Snow King The Flier.
sentences.cn: 雪橇上也印着优美的名字,玫瑰板、梅格诺莉雅、雪皇、翱翔者等等.

sentences.en: Well , you've only been on a plane twice, Mr. Frequent Flier.
sentences.cn: 是吗?你自己还不是只搭过两次飞机, 空中飞人先生!

sentences.en: You've been racking up quite a lot of frequent - flier miles , son.
sentences.cn: 最近航空公司没少谢你这个财神吧?

words.tran_cn: [航]飞行员；快车；飞行物；（美）广告传单

trans.tran_cn: 飞行器驾驶员，动作敏捷的人或动物，速度很快的车辆，（产品的）宣传单
